column4: hi all, i have a server running feisty and i am trying to install python-pysqlite2. However its fails to fetch some repositories. could anyone give me some idea
Feisty isn't supported any more, and its repositories have been moved to http://old-releases.ubuntu.com/. You'll need to edit your /etc/apt/sources.list file to reflect that.
(and then run sudo apt-get update after you do that)
thanks a lot for the info
